name: Megophrys init
script:
Megophrys = (Megophrys or {})
Megophrys.givingAffs = (Megophrys.givingAffs or {})
Megophrys.targetLimb = (Megophrys.targetLimb or 'left')

Megophrys.fgColors = {
  denizen = 'cyan',
  raid = 'orange',
  los = 'orange',
  alch = 'yellow',
  bonk = 'yellow',
  bstar = 'yellow',
  fiyah = 'yellow',
  pummel = 'yellow',
}
